questions.question: The transformer works on principle of ___________.
The ratio of secondary induced emf to primary induced emf is known as ___________

answers.c: It is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits
answers.d: It provides more safety and It is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits

answers.c: Both Step up transformer and Step down transformer

questions.question: The important characteristics of the fluid used in CB are : -

answers.a: It should have good thermal and chemical stability
answers.b: It should have high dielectric strength and are extinguish ability
answers.c: Non- inflammability and high thermal conductivity

answers.b: SF6 gas has to be reconditioned after every operation of the breaker and additional equipment is required for these purposes
answers.c: Both Expensive and SF6 gas has to be reconditioned after every operation of the breaker and additional equipment is required for these purposes

questions.question: In double bus'bar system ,there is a provision of a bus-bar coupling switch for transferring operation from one bus-bar to another _________
_________ is a device which is used to switch from one bus to the other without any interruption in power supply and without creating hazardous arcs.
